author: manunlp
content:
Random question: Is there any sense for a bootnode to have a `cgc` defined?
I'm asking because Prysm tries to retrieve data columns from bootnodes (with a cgc=128 by the way) and it obviously fails.

```
[2025-05-13 11:32:05.51] DEBUG sync: Peer did not provide all requested data columns blockRoot=0x88ed2955ab56e92a823ab92a7c582ed0a1ee3d01f749aafcbf1e04b259d2097a missingColumns=[18 42 52 59 90 92 125] peer=16Uiu2HAmEu8ConHHVdfQbYtg8iCFKkgwjFrgrsdXZoMkJGHYJsTG
```

author: barnabasbusa
content: bootnode is a supernode, LH

author: barnabasbusa
content: so it should have all columns

author: manunlp
content:
ho? I thought bootnodes were some "empty" nodes.
So, yes in this case LH did not respond correctly I guess.

author: manunlp
content:
This block is at slot `27982`.
- Slot time: 2025-05-13 09:31:24 UTC
- Request time 2025-05-13 09:32:05.51 UTC

<@466006586477772831> please tell me if you think Prysm did something wrong!

author: barnabasbusa
content: They are not

author: barnabasbusa
content: all devnets using bootnodes of some client combo

author: cortze
content: <@412614104222531604> do you have at hand the ENR of the bootnode?

author: barnabasbusa
content: https://bootnode-1.peerdas-devnet-7.ethpandaops.io/meta/api/v1/inventory.json

author: jimmygchen
content: Interesting, this looks like the bug that was recently fixed. Checking the version on the node now

author: jimmygchen
content:
<@412614104222531604> looks like the bootnode node is running an older version (`ethpandaops/lighthouse:peerdas-devnet-7-4de1a73`), probably missed when rolling the latest version out. I've just checked `ligthouse-geth-1` and it is running the correct version `ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable-5933901`.

Would you mind rolling this version to the bootnode(s) too please üôè

author: barnabasbusa
content: on it

author: barnabasbusa
content: yeah we don't automatically bump bootnode when we roll lighthouse

author: barnabasbusa
content: sorry for that

author: jimmygchen
content: all good, thank you!

author: barnabasbusa
content: should be rolled now

author: manunlp
content: Thanks for the quick investigation and fix!
